website_summaries.verdict: A model that works in many applications and as well as the more expensive cameras.
pros: Can detect water leaks in the walls
Comes with a travel bag, strap, and USB cord
cons: The camera can only measure thermal differences
If none exist, it cannot detect an image

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I am building a new house and had some concerns about the insulation installation. I had Icynene installed and saw gaps that concerned me. I was assured by the insulation contractor that the gaps were normal and that I just wasn't able to see down in the gaps where there was an abundance of insulation. The thermal camera does all the work, instantly pointing out hotspots. I had hundreds of hotspots in my house, and when I sent the pictures to the insulation contractor, he was amazed at all the spots his guys missed. Between the extra insulation I will get and the energy savings I will enjoy in the future, the camera has paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF G.

customer_reviews.title: 1.5 feet or 20 feet, good quality pics
customer_reviews.text: Note pictures attached. The circuit board is a power supply driving relays, easy to troubleshoot which circuits are malfunctioning quickly. Other photo is on a very cold day- you can see where my couch is pushed against the window preventing heat from escaping the single pane windows...and the curtains have no insulation effect. I would say easily this device is paying for itself. Battery lasts long enough, and for the smaller picture size (but great resolution for the $), 3 gig is LOTS of room. Transfer to computer is easy, and recharges quickly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Seward

customer_reviews.title: Great product at great price.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is used for building inspections. I purchased 5 of them for my company, replacing older FLIR units. The combination IR / visible light camera is helpful in showing location for reporting. It has good resolution, and shows 3 temperatures, spot, high and low. I find it to be as good or better than my FLIR i7 ($2000)
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Pacifico

customer_reviews.title: Works Great. It took some getting use to but the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works Great. It took some getting use to but the images are great and the adjustment between IR and visual light are perfect for my home inspection business. Also fast response makes it good for quick wall scanning. The only drawback is once a pict is taken, it wants a response as to save it. But other than that, just as good as a 1000 dollar model.
customer_reviews.author: BruceG

customer_reviews.title: All or more than expected at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Not everything I wanted, but it didn't cost $30,000. Very good performance for the craftsman/builder/homeowner. With a little understanding of thermodynamics, this is a dynamic tool. I can add that the customer service in my case was beyond reproach. Thank you for a great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: ChasD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: It took me 10-15 minutes to go over and set my custom specs and I love it. I'm a HVAC tech and this has been on my wish list for a long time but when I saw the price,warranty and quality I pulled the trigger. This will literally increase my income by showing homeowner something easy to understand why it has to be fixed and then prove my work has fixed it. No brainer for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rhino

customer_reviews.title: Not a flir
customer_reviews.text: Well if your looking for this type of imaging, it's not a flir. It has to be close to what you want to get readings from, the image quality is grainy at best. it will do the job but just don't expect a holy cow moment to happen.
customer_reviews.author: larry b.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This Camera! Horrible Product and Worst Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This camera claims to have a 24 month warranty and a 60 day money back guarantee. "WARRANTY: We offer hassle-free after-sale services: 60-Day money back guarantee, 24 month warranty, Lifetime technical supports. We won't let our customer waste their money." Its total BS. Once you buy this thing good luck ever getting a hold of this China-based company for any type of support. We emailed them months ago because we had an issue where ours just turned off intermittently without any warning and plenty of battery life. Well...still no reply. Buy a reputable brand, don't fall into the "feature trap" we fell into.
customer_reviews.author: Jg305

customer_reviews.title: COLOR SCREEN STOPPED WORKING ALL TOGETHER
customer_reviews.text: The color screen stopped working all together. It no longer works as a thermal imager. Can not find any information on technical support or warranty. Website just shows a company in China. Emailed the company as the only contact information that was given and never given any response. Not worth the savings in price for the risk of no warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Derek C.

customer_reviews.title: No Technical Service in the U.S.
customer_reviews.text: The unit initially worked very well. 10 days. Then the unit stopped allowing me to download pictures to my laptop. The main issue was that there is absolutely no technical support in the United States. Even the Amazon help Technician was trying to reach someone in China. Technical service is important to me. spend the extra money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Behnke

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: They do call this thermal camera and yes it works ,If you need or want a clear screen dont buy this product i use Thermal Cameras in electrical and this camera couldnt distinguish between the breaker and buss bar due to the fuzz image ,that is when i decided to return this and replace it with a tryed and tested FLIR! No issue with a fuuzzy image.
customer_reviews.author: robert zorich

customer_reviews.title: Thermal Imager
customer_reviews.text: This thing will work so well in every location. Saves you money on heating and cooling. It shows where the cold and hot spots are in your house. Not made for this but you can scan body and it will show places that you have pain or fever in. Works GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: willie alexander

customer_reviews.title: Short life battery
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item in November of 2019. When we received it we tested it and it worked. It has only been used a time or two and was charged after each use along with the every three months as recommended. We then went to use it recently and it will not turn on or stay on unless it is plugged in. We contacted the customer/technical support about getting it repaired/replaced since it has a one year limited warranty and they advised they cannot help. It is more than likely a battery issue however you cannot replace the battery yourself since there is no opening or way to open it without damaging it.
customer_reviews.author: Disgruntled Fire Department

customer_reviews.title: Can no longer see files with USB connection
customer_reviews.text: Was able to get to the image files a single time when first purchased. A few months later - nothing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Thermal Camera Value
customer_reviews.text: The HT -18 is a great value for a thermal camera with decent resolution. I use it for home inspection and electronics testing. The design is much more robust than the add-on to your phone type and easier to handle as well. The User interface is well designed however could use a a few tweaks regarding how the image hold function button works. Overall I find the camera very useful and affordable. The case is very well made and fits perfectly. Highly recommended product as nothing out there in this price segment that comes close. Will try again to add photos when Amazon fixes their bug (images never load, app just hangs).
customer_reviews.author: Qing Yan

customer_reviews.title: Best thermal imaging camera I've had
customer_reviews.text: I love this infrared thermal camera. It works perfectly for what I do as a home inspector
customer_reviews.author: MAPAHaus

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Thermal Imaging Camera
customer_reviews.text: This IR camera costs a fraction of the similar-looking Flir camera retailing for $2000. I use it several times a week as a home inspector, and have found the camera to be easy to use and durable. The imaging and resolution are not as good as an E6 Flir camera, but good enough to be a valued tool. It is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: HandyDad

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used FLIR in the fire service for years. Although they are more powerful and can see through walls etc, they are also very expensive. This item provides a quality experience for a reasonable price. I'm very pleased with the purchase as it meets my needs adequately and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: James Edward Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Really handy product
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for use on corporate aircraft to check heating elements in windows and floor mat heater/water system drain heaters, etc... It's quite intuitive and allows us to see if we've got everything connected properly, and shows us if we've only got partial heating or a possible bad component. It works much better than the laser thermometer we had been using, which only provides a localized readout, and had problems reading temperatures within several layers or panes.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Marcks

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome product, I'm a quality control HVAC technician and this thing is awesome! I've used the flir phone models and this one's resolution is much better than it . Highly recommend this product. Very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera and Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome, works great, quality is great, and price unbeatable. We are very happy with this purchase. Thought I had a technical problem and contacted technical support. They were extremely helpful and help me resolve the issue very quickly. Cannot say enough great things about the device and their support staff. Would highly recommend this camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so far works good
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, and so far meet all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: FLIR detector initial review - has performed well
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this device long enough to give a complete review yet. I am waiting for a honey bee hive package to arrive to monitor hive temperatures and health. From what I have used it for seems to be a very useful instrument. It does reveal heat loss areas in outer walls indicating poor insulation. I will post more next month (May 2019) when I have used it for my intended purpose. This is the first flir device I have owned or used.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value, great thermal imager
customer_reviews.text: I use this for thermal imaging of electronics to measure component heating and identify components that may be overheating or near their thermal limits. It's easy to use and the ability to control the mix of thermal and visible image is wonderful. Storing images is easy as is transferring them via USB cable. It saved me a huge amount over the big-name imagers and gives much higher resolution! Awesome value, great thermal imager.
customer_reviews.author: David Albert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent at this price point
customer_reviews.text: I used the HTI18 for surveillance of roof leaks and for detection of insulation problems. It worked very well for these purposes. Resolution is excellent. I am a homeowner and do not feel the need for the more than $1000 products that offer far less than this.
customer_reviews.author: Fred R

customer_reviews.title: Terrific and affordable thermal imaging device
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with the performance of this device. It easily rivals other similar products costing $1,200 or more. I purchased this to help identify the cause of cold spots in our old home in the winter time and why the air conditioner works so hard in the summer time. As a landlord, it also helps identify where mice was nesting in a wall and attic in our rented home.
customer_reviews.author: HANS P

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great!
customer_reviews.text: So far I've used it to check temps on some new 220v wiring, both at socket and c/b panel. Also, new oven door had very slight warp and I confirmed no heat leakage. Also, had new ductwork for a downdraft and was able to see leakage into joist space from outside and seal up the leak. Resolution is more than adequate for my needs. Just for grins, I used it to check temp on a cast iron pan with a small amount of oil, to fry corn tortillas at 350 - worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Joebagodonuts

customer_reviews.title: Best thermal imaging in the price range.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Does everything I needed it to do. Super easy to use. Super accurate when tested side by side with my Milwaukee IR non contact temp gun. In comparison to others I've worked with, this thing does better than far more expensive units. The last photo is of an airplane heading away from me, The center black dot.
customer_reviews.author: T man.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome and for the price you can’t go wrong. I own a small home improvement remodel company and this camera has paid for its self 5 times over. It’s great for showing clients lack of insulation water leaks heat and coolant loss around old doors and windows. The camera is very easy to use and its a powerful visual aid when explaining a problem to a client. If you been thinking about a infrared camera you can’t go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent thermal imager
customer_reviews.text: I've read dozens of reviews of thermal imagers and finally decided on this one after I saw a recorded demonstration of this one compared to an older model Fluke. This one meets what the description says. I am very pleased with the image displayed for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: John G Berube

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have never used any other thermal camera but this unit appears to be well built. Screen resolution meets my needs for home use. Has different settings for matte, gloss, etc. surfaces. Displays icons on screen that jump around to the hottest and coldest spots on the screen which is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Shanegrilah

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I own a brick house and we had 3 bees hives removed. The bee keeper had a $2000 thermal imager that wasn't any better than this one. This is a good product and this is my first Amazon review. I wouldn't bother doing a review unless the product was good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good thing!
customer_reviews.text: This themmal camera is too fun. l have mapped my whole house for heat leakage. Found some some hot spot and beefed up the insulation in those places. I think this thing will pay for itself in energy savings and the room I fixed is much more comfortable now!
customer_reviews.author: Yuqi Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Better IR than a Flir C2
customer_reviews.text: I'm a home inspector, and this thing works great for me. I also to have a Flir C2 and I consider this an upgrade. It feels a little more cheap than the Flir, but it works incredibly well, especially given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen G Gerard

customer_reviews.title: High quality for a low price, would buy again...
customer_reviews.text: Works great... Clearer than I thought it would be... Well worth the money... No need to spend thousands of dollars when you can get this kind of quality for a fraction of the cost... If you need a thermal camera, then this ones for you...!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The download image function
customer_reviews.text: So far, I like this product download image function especially. It helps us to record our customers' equipment history easily.
customer_reviews.author: hanhan

customer_reviews.title: A nice Infrared Thermal Imager with high resolution
customer_reviews.text: I bought this infrared camera to inspect my home. It's easy to operate and the picture is very clear. It is a great tool to diagnose electricity issues. I love it. It is indeed a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Inexpensive for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Used it to detect water damage in roof
customer_reviews.author: steven tuma

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to see what is going on in the woods behind my house at night and I am very pleased with it. It shows me the wildlife, lets me find my cat when he doesn't come in, lets me see leaks in my roof and lets me determine how my engine is operating. I'm very pleased with it and the case is a nice accessory to have.
customer_reviews.author: Rick G.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and did everything as described. The resolution is excellent and the palette options and adjustments within are a great feature. A great value for its capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Valetudo

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed !
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in time, the construction of the device is not top quality but it definitely serves the purpose. I am not a technician or need the camera for professional use, I am just curious about thermal imaging and expecting to use it for fun, finding common problems in my house, car mechanics and measuring my kids temperature when he get fever. After having it for 5 minutes, I can tell you I am impressed! and for the money I am 100 percent satisfied! and the possibilities are infinite.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Use this fairly often in a heavy equipment shop to help troubleshoot hydraulic and cooling system problems. Not the best resolution but it does work and gives numbers on your hottest and coldest parts. The holster is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Zerovongyro

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment In A Long Time
customer_reviews.text: I work in refrigeration, I bought this camera to check for loose lugs on contactors and breakers and also check temperatures on refrigeration piping. So far its doing exactly what I was expecting it to do. The pictures I posted in this review speak for themselves!
customer_reviews.author: xXNubCakeXx

customer_reviews.title: Performs exactly as intended
customer_reviews.text: Performs exactly as intended. I purchased this to show hot spots at home and at work. So far seems to work. Start-up and operations were very easy, was looking at hot-spots within minutes after opening box. Unit came with enough charge on the battery to work through the start-up (did not have to wait for it to be charged to use it). Will need to get some more run time to see how it performs
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Lucius

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: I am probably being a bit harsh, but I have seen what the really high-end options are capable of. So maybe my expectations are too high. This was a decent unit but I want higher resolution and more sensitivity. Plus the interface could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Deals

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The gun works awesome does everything as advertised, excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband ....retired firefighter ....and was shocked at the quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Zoe L.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Only used a couple of times. Seems to work great. Not as good as the ones costing $1000. But I expected that.. Well worth the money !
customer_reviews.author: Aircooled VW's of the USA

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is an good as my trainers that he paid way more for VERY good wish I could give them 10 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Price and Performance
customer_reviews.text: This is our second TIC. This one appears to provide all that we need at about one-tenth of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Howell

customer_reviews.title: This is a good starter camera for first time users.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is easy to use and performs quick scans, used on Utilities Systems. The HTI-18 camera needs a reporting software that supports there camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: my daddy like the high cost performance
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy a 1000 dollar FLIR but found this one for my father, this doer everything I was looking for, high resolution, came with bult-in storage card and specially-made case! my daddy like the high cost performance! it helps find the cold air spots from poor insulation but also find hot spots in your fuse box.For fun you can also use this to find moles under the grass. The capture image feature is handy to have also.
customer_reviews.author: Pingping Chen

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: The device is easy to use and useful in identifying drafts around the house during a cold winter so that we can fix those
customer_reviews.author: E D

customer_reviews.title: Good performance for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, performance is good, pleased with ability to display temperature points. Reasonable cost for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Bush II

customer_reviews.title: ABOUT MY NEW CAMERA.....
customer_reviews.text: I receive my new camera, I liked the thermo imagens, I don't like that doesn't have software, I would like to know if does the manufacturer company has any software for it?
customer_reviews.author: alexander soquer

customer_reviews.title: Best affordable thermal on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I love every feature this baby has compared to a flir I own! In my opinion it beats a flir hands down w features and resolution!
customer_reviews.author: George f. Geren

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Wokrs as advertisement . this IR camera has saved my company money and time by not have to hire third party inspectors to evaluate water leaks, missing insulation and air gaps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well in detecting moisture - leaks in roofs etc.
customer_reviews.author: Meeraj

customer_reviews.title: Lags on the image scanning and does not record.
customer_reviews.text: Not able to record and a lags a bit on the refresh rate...but wonderful images and picture quality!
customer_reviews.author: George and Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for couple months then white screen
customer_reviews.text: Product worked well for a couple months then every time i put it on, it works for a couple seconds then a white screen.
customer_reviews.author: Kks

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I am using it to see wildlife at nighttime. I am very pleased with everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Ranman

customer_reviews.title: Could be used for ghost hunting
customer_reviews.text: It was used for work and was a great tool. Worked as it should
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to snap on $1500.00 imager
customer_reviews.text: Great piece. Comparable to the snap on $1500.00 imager ( co-worker has one of the snap on units).
customer_reviews.author: paul KROUSE

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, very useful. I recommend this for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: paola trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Black and white screen is my favorite for total dark night vision. Bought it to find spots that were missed with blown in insulation works great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Meese

customer_reviews.title: Keep it charged.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera works well and its pouch attaches to my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Centsable Inspections

customer_reviews.title: Price reflects quality of images
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for home inspections. The thermal imaging is ok not great. The quality is reflected in the cost of the unit. You can spend 5x the amount to get a better picture.
customer_reviews.author: David M Wolf

customer_reviews.title: fast delivered, good quality device.
customer_reviews.text: light weight, proper image quality, accurate temperature measuring (compare with body thermal meter ).
customer_reviews.author: Allaszo

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good product.
customer_reviews.text: They gave me a quantity discount, ordered 2. So far they are working great.
customer_reviews.author: James Horak

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this instead of a Fluke inferred meter which was a lot more money and it works great no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Pat G.

customer_reviews.title: Thermal Imager Camera
customer_reviews.text: Pitchers you take from this product are very clear and you can see what the problem is really fast by the many different colors it has. Two thumbs up and 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest E Curtin III

customer_reviews.title: Decent Camera
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly well. Controls are a little confusing at first.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A.

customer_reviews.title: Yep
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the price. Definitely not one to take in a fire but it does a good.job
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Luther

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit...easy to operate.... Fast shipping like always...great price.. Thank you !!!
customer_reviews.author: JR. Big John

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This thermal imager does what it says. I am quite happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lezza

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a contractor and I have an occasional use for one of these to detect air leakage, etc. I used to borrow a IR cam from a buddy of mine who did energy audits. He retired and got rid of all his stuff, so I needed a new solution. He purchased his camera several years ago for several thousand dollars. This one does a better job and does it at a fraction of the cost! Used it on a current build to spot areas that needed more insulation and/or better air sealing. It paid for itself on the first use. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hennessy

product_meta.title: 220 x 160 IR Resolution Infrared Thermal Imager, Handheld 35200 Pixels Thermal Imaging Camera,Infrared Thermometer with 3.2" Color Display Screen
feature_bullets: ✔ HIGH RESOLUTION IMAGERY - Our 3.2" full color display screen shows thermal detection and visible light imagery in 220 x 160 resolution, allowing the user to see the full range of infrared imagery.
✔ CHOOSE FROM 5 PALETTES - Choose the ideal color scale for your job - Rainbow,Iron Red, Cold Color, Black and White, or White and Black.

✔ 3 GB BUILT-IN MEMORY CARD INCLUDED - No need to worry about buying an extra SD card or losing your recordings - we include 3 GB of storage so you can look back at the recordings on a laptop, TV, or other device.

✔ IDEAL FOR PROFESSIONALS - This imaging camera is ideal for work in home inspection , fire-fighting, archaeology, traffic, farming, and electronic manufacturing fields,as well as any job that requires accurate temperature readings (accurate within 2.5°F).

✔ LIGHTWEIGHT AND COMFORTABLE GRIP - This camera is only 0.83 pound, perfect for easy storage and taking anywhere - and, it comes with one travel pouch. Shaped in a"gun" style with an ergonomic handle, for comfort and ease at any angle. WARRANTY: We offer hassle-free after-sale services: 60-Day money back guarantee, 24 month warranty, Lifetime technical supports. We won't let our customer waste their money.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars215 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
